episode54.name: 55 TCU Preview
episode54.description: The guys gather to recap the Florida A&M game, and add one more chapter to the Great Stadium Debate. Next up is TCU in what has become the Daniel Plainview Bowl (Milkshake Bet III). Can the Hogs compete with the Horned Frogs? Listen here and find out.
episode54.keywords: Bert, Arkansas, WPS, Woo Pig, TCU, SEC, Football
